definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: This paper studied the acid hydrolysis conditions of fenugreek neutral polysaccharide.
sentences.chinese: 本文對胡蘆巴中性多糖酸水解的工藝條件進行研究。

sentences.english: InIndiait is mixed with yogurt and used as a conditioner for hair.
sentences.chinese: 在印度，將胡蘆巴和酸奶混合，可用作護髮劑。

sentences.english: Objective: To detect the contents of effective component in the extractions of Fenugreek seeds.
sentences.chinese: 目的測定胡蘆巴降血糖提取物中各有效部位的含量。

sentences.english: The optimum ultrasonic extraction technology of trigonelline in pumpkin flesh was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究超聲波法提取南瓜果肉胡蘆巴鹼最優工藝條件。

sentences.english: Fenugreek is an annual Mediterranean and Asiatic herb with aromatic seeds.
sentences.chinese: 胡蘆巴是一種年度性地中海和亞洲帶有種的草藥。
